name: Modal
author: Daniel Buchner, Arron Schaar
description: The modal element can be used to show notices or secondary content above the z-level of the page.

documentation.description: The modal element can be used to show notices or secondary content above the z-level of the page.

events.reveal: Firing this event will cause the modal to show.

attributes.hidden: A boolean attribute that when present will hide the modal.
attributes.overlay: A boolean attribute that when present will create a transparant overlay behind the modal.
attributes.escape-hide: A boolean attribute that when present will allow the modal to be closed by pressed the escape key.
attributes.overlay-tap-hide: A boolean attribute that when present will allow the modal to be closede by clicking on the overlay.

setters.overlay: Setter for the boolean attribute overlay.
setters.escapeHide: Setter for the boolean attribute escape-hide.
setters.overlayTapHide: Setter for the boolean attribute overlay-tap-hide.

getters.overlay: Getter for the boolean attribute overlay.
getters.escapeHide: Getter for the boolean attribute escape-hide.
getters.overlayTapHide: Getter for the boolean attribute overlay-tap-hide.

methods.show: Removes the hidden attribute and shows the modal
methods.hide: Applies the hidden attribute and hides the modal
methods.toggle: Toggles the modal between show and hide state.
